events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the inconvenience caused by this mistake.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the delivery.
Assigning the case to customer support agent Sarah M. for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also send a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached pictures showing the incorrect product that was sent to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send instructions on how to return the wrong item at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the easy return process. Looking forward to getting my money back soon.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You will receive the amount back within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback to help us improve our service.
